alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 4:24AM EST until January 26 at 12:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Fairfield and Northern New Haven Counties. In New York, Rockland and Northern Westchester Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
